channel.title: Yidong Wang on The AI Talks
channel.description: Recent content in Yidong Wang on The AI Talks

item.title: Advancing Semi-Supervised Learning: Methods and Benchmarks
item.description: Speaker Bio: Yidong Wang is a doctoral student at the National Engineering Research Center for Software Engineering of Peking University, advised by Prof. Wei Ye and Prof. Shikun Zhang. He received his master’s degree in the Department of Information and Communications Engineering of Tokyo Institute of Technology and his bachelor’s degree in the Department of Computer Science and Technology of Nanjing University. His research interests primarily focus on semi-supervised learning, transfer learning, and imbalanced learning.
